clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Antispetic and germicidal agent It is indicated for use as a patient preoperative skin preparation for the preparation of the skin prior to surgery and to help reduce bacteria that can potentially cause skin infection

contraindications.disease: No data available calculated acute toxicity estimate 2 000 5 000 mg kg
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Microbial reduction of the skin ideally kills all skin organisms
